name: react-ui
author: Ambition Team
description: A collection of components for React.

scripts.build: npm run build_dist && npm run build_docs
scripts.build_dist: browserify dist.js -o dist/react-ui.js --no-bundle-external && uglifyjs dist/react-ui.js -o dist/react-ui.min.js
scripts.build_docs: browserify docs/js/index.js | uglifyjs -o static/js/index.min.js && stylus docs/css/index.styl --out static/css --use nib && cp node_modules/react/dist/react.min.js static/js/react.min.js
